verbs.description: pionk zibanejad rally rangers to 5 - 3 win over [V: canadiens] new york ap neal pionk scored the tiebreaking goal on a sensational end - to - end rush late in the third period and the new york rangers rallied to beat the montreal canadiens 5 - 3 on tuesday night for their fourth straight win kevin hayes pionk zibanejad rally rangers tony deangelo pavel buchnevich new york rangers canadiens henrik lundqvist montreal canadiens chris kreider new york mika zibanejad neal pionk
